metadata.synopsis: An interaction with a huge tentacle that is psychically connected to the Elder Brain. Will only appear at the Colony's Moonrise Assault entrance if we came from the Necro-Lab - the tentacle won't have broken through Moonrise Tower. The tentacle will disappear again once the Elder Brain departs.A psionic pulse will emanate from the tentacle when we approach it, and we will get psychically told some personal history from the Elder Brain.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Either use "oe Necromancer_Audience" in ReCon or go to the Audience route through the debugbook.- Escape or kill the cage you get teleported into.- Kill combat.- Go into the central corridor and to the Assault entrance of the Colony- Interact with S_COL_Entrance_Audience_Tentacle_c7291e48-45e1-43c5-b243-8b4716e1344e

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *A giant stalk of flesh rests before you, fibrous tendrils snaking up and away into darkness. It pulses like a living, breathing thing.*

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *It is alive. Your tadpole echoes awareness - and the deep, savage fury of a wild thing caged.*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *This being - the colony itself - burns to rage, to tear these impostors from its core. And instead it rests, like a docile pet.*
